title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, deleting the image file from the outline image and renaming 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg', the original image ('image1.jpg') is still displayed instead of the newly imported image.
EB: After importing the new 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, the newly imported image should be displayed instead of the original image.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
